description: This file defines a `Stock` data model with serialization and deserialization methods, including JSON (de)serialization, an enumeration for stock rating signals, and utility functions for handling JSON data related to stocks.

classes.name: Stock
classes.description: Represents a stock with properties such as symbol, name, price, change percentage, signal rating, rationale, and a composite score.

classes.name: RatingSignal
classes.description: An enumeration for stock signals: buy, hold, sell.

methods.name: Stock.fromJson
methods.description: Creates a Stock instance from a JSON map.

methods.name: Stock.toJson
methods.description: Converts a Stock instance into a JSON-compatible map.

methods.name: _signalFromString
methods.description: Converts a string to a RatingSignal enum value, defaulting to hold.

methods.name: listFromJson
methods.description: Parses a JSON string into a list of Stock objects.
